Snap_Shot.help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Aimed_Shot.help: You slash your foe with your claws, dealing a moderate amount of Lethal damage and reducing the target's defenses. This has a longer recharge than Swipe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Aimed_Shot.targetHelp: Your defenses have been compromised by your enemy's Slash attack.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Entangling_Arrow.help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can immobilize most targets, though they are not prevented from attacking. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities and limits movement.
Entangling_Arrow.targetHelp: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your actions are slowed, but are resistant to being knocked off your feet.

Shadow_Arrow.help: You fire an arrow of nether energy at your target. The target suffers smashing damage from the force of the blow and suffers negative energy damage over time, as the energy seeps into their soul. There is a chance that the target will be immobilized by this attack. There is also a chance that some of the spirit energy will splash on collision with the target, creating a pool of nether energy at the target's feet.
Shadow_Arrow.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), Chance for Immobilize(Foe) and Debuff(Foe)
Shadow_Arrow.targetHelp: You are suffering negative energy over time. There is also a chance you are immobilized.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Blazing_Arrow.help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing them to catch on fire and burn.
Blazing_Arrow.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Ice_Arrow.help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be slowed.
Ice_Arrow.targetHelp: You are frozen in a block of ice. Once free, your attack rate and running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
